title: Clone Web App RTP Policy with these parameters
custom_steps:
Clone Exisiting Cloud App RTP Policy with these parameters
        Exisiting:
                Source: User group
                Source: Add Exclusion
                Category: Cloud Storage
                Activity: Share
                Activity Constraint: to_user
                CCI App Tag: pre-defined/custom
                CCL: Medium
                App Instance: Sancationed
                Action: Alert
                Profile: None
                Destination Country: India
                Status: Enable
        Clone:
                Source: User group
                Source: Add Exclusion
                Category: Cloud Storage
                Activity: Share
                Activity Constraint: to_user
                App Instance
                Action: Alert
                Profile: None
                Destination Country: India
                Status: Disable
Apply and save,
enable the cloned Policy
custom_expected:
Verify on Editing the policy, all policy entries remains intact.
Verify the apply config saves the configuration on UI without error.
